text: The 1967–68 Scottish Inter-District Championship was a rugby union competition for Scotland's district teams.Forsyth's Rugby Record. pub. R. W. Forsyth Princes Street, Edinburgh & Renfield Street, Glasgow. 1967. This season saw the 15th Scottish Inter-District Championship. Edinburgh District, South and Glasgow District shared the competition with 2 wins and a loss each.Forsyth's Rugby Record. pub. R. W.
